Text: Review:  "it was as if time were standing still. The narrator takes you on an amazing journey from the face of the earth to the edge of the Universe (as we know it) in a stunning visual articulation of the cosmos. I have literally watched this almost everyday since first seeing it on TV. The graphics are top notch and extremely smooth. It feels as though you are right there, soaring thru the galaxies at home and way beyond. The verbage in this program is comprehensible and the terminology basic enough for these in-depth concepts of Physics and Geology to come to life and understanding for even the most un-mathematical type of minds. This program is the most fascinating and knowledge envoking of any I have seen yet about the Universe."

Aslam-Alaikum,

Thanks for the upload. This is narrated by Alec Baldwin. The audio and video are both in high quality.


Wa-Alaikum-Aslam
Good quality, amazing documentary, definitely worth your 90 minutes, fast download speed (~6mb/sec).

I actually used to have the audio rip of this (with Alec narrating), and I'd use it as my "white noise" as I slept. After 7 hours of continuous looping, Alec had always started sounding like a chipmunk... it was funny. 

This is a wonderful copy, though. I adore the creative graphics and imagery, as well as Baldwin's smooth narration.
